text: The Apex Theory is the second extended play by the American rock band Mt. Helium, formerly The Apex Theory. Released on October 9, 2001, it was the band's first release on a major label. == Track listing == == Personnel == ;The Apex Theory * Ontronik — vocals * Art Karamian — guitar * Dave Hakopyan — bass guitar * Sammy J. Watson — drums == References == Category:2001 EPs Category:Mt. Helium EPs
title: The Apex Theory (EP)
